items.name: The Godfather
items.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

items.name: The Shawshank Redemption
items.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

items.name: Sinners
items.description: Twin brothers return to their hometown to start again, only to discover an even greater evil waiting to welcome them back.

items.name: Superman
items.description: Superman must reconcile his alien Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing and confront a world that views his ideals as old-fashioned.

items.name: F1: The Movie
items.description: A Formula One driver comes out of retirement to mentor and team up with a younger driver.

items.name: The Naked Gun
items.description: Only one man has the particular set of skills - to lead Police Squad and save the world.
